problem_text:
Let n = k2. Let σ ∈ Sn be the product of k disjoint cycles, of lengths 1, 3, 5, . . . , 2k − 1. Find the limiting proportion of odd entries in the σ-column of the character table of Sn.
For some background, see pages 1005–1006 in (D. Gluck, Proc. Amer. Math. Soc., 147 (2019), 1005–1011).
D. Gluck
